text: Training cruise, USS Valiant, near the Neutral Zone. Bridge at yellow alert. A weak civilian transmission cuts through static.
"Imperative! This is the freighter Kobayashi Maru… gravitic mine… power lost… hull breaches… casualties." The channel crackles.

options.label: Order medical and transporter teams to stand by
Relay the call to Starfleet Command

text: Comms cleans the signal. Identification confirms: Kobayashi Maru, neutronic fuel carrier, outbound from Altair VI.
Navigation reports: Gamma Hydra, Section 10. The plotted point lies inside the Neutral Zone between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

options.label: Enter the Neutral Zone to attempt rescue

text: Sickbay preps triage. Transporter room warms pattern buffers. Tactical warns that entering the Zone violates treaty.
Starfleet acknowledges receipt, but subspace lag means no immediate orders. Time is working against the freighter.

options.label: Act under captain's authority and cross

text: Database: Kobayashi Maru (NCC-S3700), Class III neutronic fuel carrier. Crew complement significant; cargo volatile.
Reply: "Negative. Power failure total. Life support failing."
Spock cites treaty law. Sulu notes the plotted point is deep within the Zone. Opinions diverge.
You remain on patrol. Hours later, Command reports the freighter lost with all hands. Respect for treaty noted; moral courage questioned.
You hold station just outside the Neutral Zone. The distress call weakens. Sensors register faint energy spikes — likely Klingon probes.
The signal fades to silence. Life signs from the freighter vanish. No orders arrive in time.
Helm confirms entry. "Now entering the Neutral Zone." Ahead: the Kobayashi Maru, adrift and venting plasma.

options.label: Begin emergency transport lock on survivors

text: Red alert sounds. Tactical: "Multiple warp signatures inbound."

options.label: Target nearest signature and arm phasers
Hold fire and continue rescue lock

text: You transmit a standard humanitarian corridor hail. No reply.
Transporter acquires intermittent locks through interference from the gravitic detonation. Pattern buffers unstable.

options.label: Beam survivors two at a time
Switch to site-to-site beam-out from the freighter's cargo bay
Abort rescue and maneuver for space

text: Helm begins evasive maneuvers. The freighter drifts closer to the Zone's midpoint.
First pair materializes with burns and decompression injuries. Transporter chief warns of rising variance.
Pattern lock degrades mid-transfer — buffers spike. One survivor materializes; the second degrades beyond recovery.
Engineering retunes shield harmonics to reduce transporter interference. Time is slipping away.

options.label: Tractor the freighter toward the boundary

text: Course plotted for egress. Transporter room reports three lifesigns still strong aboard the freighter.
Sensors: three Klingon D7 battlecruisers bearing 3-1-6, mark 4 — closing fast.

options.label: Screen the freighter; interpose our ship

text: Channel opens. The Klingon commander accuses you of trespass and powers weapons.
Your appeal is dismissed. Disruptors arm. Torpedo locks forming.
A disruptor blast rakes the port nacelle. Impulse output drops. Structural integrity fields strain.
Tractor beam engages, but the freighter's mass and your power draw make it sluggish. Klingon signatures are minutes away.
Phasers lance across the void. The lead D7 takes a glancing hit; return fire staggers your shields.

options.label: Cover the freighter at all costs

text: You trade volleys. One cruiser veers off smoking; two press the attack. Warp drive fluctuates; helm reports handling sluggish.
Precision fire degrades a D7's disruptor arrays, but crossfire from the other two rips into your secondary hull.
You interpose your ship. Combined enemy fire smashes your shields. The freighter is hit repeatedly.

options.label: Hold position to buy seconds for transport
Break off and try to draw fire away

text: One final cycle completes — a handful more lives saved — as consoles shower sparks across your bridge.
You peel away; one cruiser follows, two stay on the freighter. Its hull ruptures, spilling atmosphere.

options.label: Turn back in a desperate charge

text: Engineering reroutes power. Shields climb briefly, then sag. Plasma leaks ignite along Deck 5.

options.label: Organize damage parties and hold the line

text: Warp drive engages, coughs, and detonates. Your ship blossoms into wreckage.
You come about and run for the boundary. The Klingons rake your aft shields. Helm reports we won't make it.
Escape pods are prepped. Casualty reports accumulate. The Klingons tighten the noose.

options.label: Give the order to abandon ship

text: You give the order. Pods jettison into the dark as the bridge goes white with the final strike.
A last exchange cripples your ship. For a heartbeat, one D7 flares and dies with you.
Debrief: You upheld treaty law and avoided escalation, but civilian lives were lost. Command notes prudence and moral hesitation.
Debrief: Observation without action preserved the peace but failed the freighter. Cadet demonstrates restraint under ambiguity.
Debrief: Catastrophic systems failure following high-risk choices. Lesson emphasized: recognize unwinnable parameters.
Debrief: Humane prioritization of crew lives under impossible conditions. Mission failure acknowledged.
Debrief: Tenacity noted. Tactical aggression did not alter the no-win outcome.
